main_header_nave_description: is a digital product studio that designs, develops and delivers high-end digital experiences.
about_us_description_p1: Working with nave means that you meet people who care and collaborate with the ones who actually do the work.
about_us_description_p2: We use technology and creativity to make digital products that reach people in more efficient and user-centered ways.
about_us_description_p3: Our mission is to help companies to understand before acting, to act with precision and to profit from change.
about_us_quote: If you are also moved by ideas, let's talk.
seneca_quote_text: “Associate with people who are likely to improve you.”
services_discovery: It is a consulting service that analyzes ideas, gathers data, maps problems to be solved and guarantees that future proposed directions have a real business value, are desirable to users, viable for the company, and possible to be developed with the available technology.
services_experience_and_product_design: A multidisciplinary team designs and tests solutions observing the experience you want to create, evaluating possible new features and new business opportunities throughout the design and prototyping processes.
services_digital_products: We work at all stages of a product development process and from a validated scope, dedicated teams transform the designed solutions into digital products, making functional deliveries every two weeks for validation.
services_outsourcing: We act as a digital production partner for corporations, start ups and agencies. We compose or integrate design and development teams working on digital projects, offering a specialized workforce to deal with demands and enable more delivery power.
process_understand_description: we investigate the issue & assess the current scenario.
process_explore_description: we imagine possibilities and plan ways to reach a solution.
process_improve_description: we monitor and suggest improvement opportunities.
